mutants.code:
import re
from collections import Counter

def word_count(s):
    s = s.lower()
    s = re.sub('', '', s)
    s = re.sub('[^\\w\\s]', ' ', s)
    words = s.split()
    word_counts = Counter(words)
    unique_words = len(word_counts)
    return (unique_words, word_counts)

import re
from collections import Counter

def word_count(s):
    s = s.lower()
    s = re.sub('[-]', 'MUTATED', s)
    s = re.sub('[^\\w\\s]', ' ', s)
    words = s.split()
    word_counts = Counter(words)
    unique_words = len(word_counts)
    return (unique_words, word_counts)

import re
from collections import Counter

def word_count(s):
    s = s.lower()
    s = re.sub('[-]', '', s)
    s = re.sub('', ' ', s)
    words = s.split()
    word_counts = Counter(words)
    unique_words = len(word_counts)
    return (unique_words, word_counts)

import re
from collections import Counter

def word_count(s):
    s = s.lower()
    s = re.sub('[-]', '', s)
    s = re.sub('[^\\w\\s]', '', s)
    words = s.split()
    word_counts = Counter(words)
    unique_words = len(word_counts)
    return (unique_words, word_counts)
